title: TimestampValidator
description: A validator specifying the constraints on a timestamp.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

timeUnits.description: The time units that the timestamp can have.
timeUnits.$comment: A timestamp is valid if its `timeUnit` is amongst the `timeUnits` of the validator.

minimum.description: The inclusive lower limit for a timestamp.
minimum.$comment: A timestamp is valid if it is greater than, or exactly equal to, `minimum`.

maximum.description: The inclusive upper limit for a timestamp.
maximum.$comment: A timestamp is valid if it is less than, or exactly equal to, `maximum`.
